In August 2011 , Anesthesiology branch Chinese Medical Association launch first version Chinese Consensus Standard Clinical Practice Inhalation Anesthesia ( Consensus ) order standardize practice China . The proposed registry aim evaluate current inhalation practice one year Consensus release , related patient outcome . This registry evaluate sevoflurane anesthesia , include screening , induction , maintenance , emergence , follow-up within 24 hour post-operation .
